content.name: integer
content.prop: integer x = ?n. abs x = real_of_nat n

content.name: rational
content.prop: rational x = ?m. ?n. integer m & integer n & neg (n = 0) & x = m / n

content.name: real_truncate_pos
content.prop: 0 <= x --> ?n. ?r. 0 <= r & r < 1 & (x = real_of_nat n + r)

content.name: real_truncate
content.prop: ?n. ?r. integer n & 0 <= r & r < 1 & (x = n + r)

content.name: floor
content.prop: floor x = THE n. integer n & 0 <= x - n & x - n < 1

content.name: frac
content.prop: frac x = THE r. integer (x - r) & 0 <= r & r < 1

content.name: floor_unique
content.prop: (integer a & a <= x & x < a + 1) = (floor x = a)

description: The integer/rational-value reals, and the 'floor' and 'frac' functions.
name: floor
